content: **finished measurements ** width 45 length 60 **gauge ** square = 15 across **hooks & notions ** us size k-10 5 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle locking stitch marker **materials ** premier® yarns parfait® chunky 100% polyester 3 5oz/100g 131yds/120m mc 1150-01 white 4 balls premier® yarns minikins™ chenille 100% polyester 1 76oz/50g 54yds/50m 1 ball of each color below cc1 2174-02 horizon cc2 2174-09 geode cc3 2174-07 popsicle cc4 2174-06 candy hearts cc5 2174-08 peony cc6 2174-03 beachbound cc7 2174-05 tea party cc8 2174-12 beary cute cc9 2174-10 raindrops on roses cc10 2174-01 sunset cc11 2174-11 iris cc12 2174-04 seersucker patchwork **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** chain slip stitches and double_crochet stitches working in joined rounds **pattern notes** this blanket is made up of 12 separate squares that are seamed together using mattress stitch
